hero_title: AI Voice & Chatbots for Aussie Businesses
ai_voice_chatbot_service: AI Voice & Chatbots for Australian Businesses
hero_subtitle: Never miss a lead. Our AI agents handle calls and chats 24/7, turning enquiries into customers.
demo_subtitle: Drop your number below and Converto AI will call you now as a demo.
demo_form_subtitle: Enter your phone number and Converto AI will call you within 30 seconds
demo_disclaimer: By submitting, you agree to receive a demo call from Converto AI. No spam, just a quick demo.
demo_success_message: Converto AI will call you at {{phone}} within the next 30 seconds.
demo_expect_1: Converto AI will introduce itself as an AI assistant
demo_expect_2: It will ask about your business needs
demo_expect_3: You'll experience the natural conversation flow
demo_expect_4: The call will last about 2-3 minutes
demo_error: There was a problem sending your request. Please try again.
contact_subtitle: Get in touch with our team to learn how Converto AI can automate your lead qualification process.
contact_get_in_touch_desc: Ready to see how Converto AI can revolutionise your sales process? Our team is here to help you get started.
contact_response_time_desc: We typically respond to all enquiries within 2 hours during business hours. For urgent matters, please call us directly.
contact_form_message_placeholder: Tell us about your lead generation needs...
contact_form_success_message: Thank you for reaching out. We'll get back to you within 2 hours.
howitworks_subtitle: See how Converto AI's AI chatbots and voice agents automate your customer interactions and business processes.
howitworks_step1_title: We analyse your Australian business needs
howitworks_step1_desc: Our team works with you to understand your customer service, sales, and automation requirements.
howitworks_step2_desc: We create tailored chatbots and voice agents that match your brand voice and business processes.
howitworks_step3_desc: Connect seamlessly with your website, CRM, WhatsApp, Facebook, and other platforms you use.
howitworks_step4_title: We deploy and train your AI
howitworks_step4_desc: Your AI agents go live and start handling customer enquiries, calls, and support 24/7 automatically.
howitworks_step5_title: You focus on growing your business
howitworks_step5_desc: While AI handles routine tasks, you can focus on strategy, growth, and high-value customer relationships.
howitworks_cta_desc: Get a free consultation and see how AI can transform your customer service and operations.
features_title: AI Voice & Chatbot for Modern Business
features_subtitle: We create custom AI chatbots and voice agents for your business—so you can automate, engage, and support your customers 24/7.
features_voice_chat_desc: We build tailored AI voice agents and chatbots for your business needs.
features_humanlike_desc: Converto AI sounds real, warm, and intelligent—your customers won't know it's AI.
features_omnichannel_desc: Voice, chat, SMS, and more—reach your customers wherever they are.
features_crm_desc: Seamlessly connect with your CRM, Google Sheets, and more.
features_automated_desc: Automate repetitive tasks and free up your team for what matters most.
features_247_desc: Never miss a customer—Converto AI works around the clock for your business.
